subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It may not be perfectly attainable, but Dirk Nowitzki may provide the Knicks’ Danilo Gallinari with a rough template for N.B.A. success.
snippet: It may not be perfectly attainable, but Dirk Nowitzki may provide the Knicks’ Danilo Gallinari with a rough template for N.B.A. success.
